message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this truly unique product. Given its value and potential, I'm asking for $1,400,000. I believe this is a fair starting point for negotiations.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product and understand your position. I would like to propose a price of $1,300,000 for the product.
Bob, thanks for your counter-offer.  I understand your perspective on the value, but I can't go as low as $1,300,000. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $1,350,000?
I appreciate your response, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $1,325,000 for the product.
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. How about we split the difference again and settle at $1,337,500? This would be a mutually beneficial agreement.
Thank you for your proposal, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $1,330,000 for the product.
